attributes.action: Award Ukraine the George Cross for it's bravery in defending it's homeland.
attributes.additional_details: In effect Ukraine is fighting a proxy war for NATO. We cannot be involved militarily for obvious reasons but awarding this honour would give Ukrainians a morale boost. They have fought with exceptional bravery in resistance of an unprovoked invasion by Russia.
attributes.background: During the last war Malta was awarded the George Cross for it's outstanding bravery in defending it's island against a mighty power and saving a vital naval base.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
